sense.def:
One's impression of someone or something
je podoba, ki jo nekdo ali nekaj pusti pri nekom.

seg.quote: They give the impression of not working.
I had the impression that he didn't trust me.

sense.def:
An impression
je tudi zabavno posnemanje znane osebe.

seg.quote: Have you seen her impressions of the TV newscasters?

sense.def:
To be under the impression that something is true
pomeni verjeti, da je nekaj res.

seg.quote: They were under the impression I had come to stay.

sense.def:
To make an impression
pomeni imeti močan vpliv na ljudi; ta povzroči, da si nas zapomnijo.

seg.quote: She did not fail to make an impression.
